data.title: He Was There from the Day We Moved In New York Review Books Children's Collection
data.meta_description: Hardcover. Reprint. Illustrated by Edward Gorey. Square octavo. Fine in pictorial boards, without a dust jacket as issued. Briefly Inscribed by the author on the front fly. Levine is the author of seven children’s books and is an accomplished director and choreographer. Item #583530 ISBN: 9781590175156
data.text:
Hardcover. Reprint. Illustrated by Edward Gorey. Square octavo. Fine in pictorial boards, without a dust jacket as issued. Briefly Inscribed by the author on the front fly. Levine is the author of seven children’s books and is an accomplished director and choreographer.

Item #583530

ISBN: 9781590175156
